atom:entry.atom:title: Amber Alert in Washington D.C.
atom:entry.atom:summary: DATE/TIME: 06/03/10, 1915 HRS. VICTIM(S): KHAYRI DOE JR. M/B BLK/BRO 3'0", 40 1022 LBS. LIGHT COMPLEXION. DOB 06/24/06. WEARING RED SHORTS, WHITE T-SHIRT, W/BLUE COLLAR. 1023 LOCATION: 5721 DOE ST., WASHINGTON D.C. SUSPECT(S): KHAYRI DOE SR. DOB 04/18/71 M/B, BLK HAIR, 1024 BRO EYE. VEHICLE: 81' BUICK 2-DR, BLUE (4XXX000).
